body: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARIES-1475

title: [ARIES-1474] Fix init/destroy method inheritence.
body: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARIES-1474

title: [ARIES-1464] Add support for @Scope in blueprint-maven-plugin.
body:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARIES-1464

Add support for setting the scope of beans defined using blueprint-maven-plugin.

title: change log level of catched exception
body: An exception at the creation of the dummy object does not need to be critical at all. Change log level from warning to debug.

title: Aries 1453 Support for Fragment-Host requirements using Version Ranges
body: See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARIES-1453 for a description of the problem.

title: Use ASM5 Opcodes instead of the ASM4 and implement ASM 5 visitor api.
body:
This solution fix issue on weaving code that use Java 8 specific language features.
Without this fix you can get the following exception:

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: INVOKESPECIAL/STATIC on interfaces require ASM 5
    at org.objectweb.asm.MethodVisitor.visitMethodInsn(Unknown Source)
    at org.objectweb.asm.ClassReader.a(Unknown Source)
    at org.objectweb.asm.ClassReader.b(Unknown Source)
    at org.objectweb.asm.ClassReader.accept(Unknown Source)
    at org.objectweb.asm.ClassReader.accept(Unknown Source)
    at org.apache.aries.spifly.dynamic.ClientWeavingHook.weave(ClientWeavingHook.java:61)

title: factored headers and clauses classes and added equals() and hashCode()
body: issue #ARIES-1387

title: ARIES-628 fix transaction itests
body: use right version of org.apache.aries.transaction.blueprint to fix transaction itests after commit 70e39b6

title: Performance improvements for service invocation flow
body: reduce memory allocation in Collaborator (service invocation flow), replace locking with a AtomicInteger in QuiesceInterceptor/ServiceRecipe logic to reduce threads contention

title: ARIES-628
body:
Unfortunately Transaction annotation doesn't work for me. The AnnotationParser implements a BeanProcessor but it is injected by TxNamespaceHandler as a MutablePassThroughMetadata, which doesn't extend ExtendedBeanMetadata. BlueprintContainerImpl ignores such processors. 
I have fixed this problem just like the AuthorizationNsHandler.

Second commit allows to use the JTA 1.2 Transactional annotations.

title: ARIES-1324: allow to use annotations and configuration files simultaneously
body: Currently it is not possible to mix Blueprint annotations and configuration files in same bundle. In some cases (e.g. using of tx:enable-annotation or autzh:enable) it is necessary to use configuration file, but on the other side the annotations are closer to the code. It would be great to allow to use Blueprint annotations and configuration files simultaneously.

title: Correction for bug ARIES-914, probably not the good way to do …
body:
Please see my comment on JIRA for ARIES-914.
I'm not sure this is the good way to solve this bug.

For an xml file :

``` xml
<bean
    id="totoEmbeddedServer"
    class="toto.EmbeddedServer"
    scope="singleton"
    init-method="init"
    destroy-method="destroy">
    <cm:managed-properties persistent-id="toto" update-strategy="component-managed" update-method="configure"/>
</bean>
```

I expect the "configure(Map)" method to be called at startup, as it is done for a container managed property.

title: ARIES-1324
body: Currently it is not possible to mix Blueprint annotations and configuration files in the same bundle. In some cases (e.g. using of tx:enable-annotation or autzh:enable) it is necessary to use configuration file, but on the other side the annotations are closer to the code. It would be great to allow to use Blueprint annotations and configuration files simultaneously.

title: [ARIES-1290] Update XSDs to allow ext-namespace elements/attrs to be used in cm:property-placeholder
ARIES-1023 and ARIES-1079 fixing
body:
In this solution there are 2 PersistenceContextProvider services registered. The first is GlobalPersistenceManager, same before, but now with property org.apache.aries.jpa.context.type=context. The second one is PersistenceBundleManager with property org.apache.aries.jpa.context.type=unit. 
In this way, when the NSHandler processes the Blueprint xml file notify unit name and bundle to "context" service and properties to "unit" service. The "unit" service create a new EntityManagerFactory using these properties.

title: [ARIES-1161] Use BundleWiring as the key for proxy classloaders
Update pom.xml to use an bundle existent at maven central
body: at maven central there are no bundle with GAV org.eclipse:org.eclipse.osgi:3.10.0.v20140606-1445

title: ARIES-1148 - prevent a NPE ignoring files other than zip archives
body: this patch fix the NPE that happens when it tries to process directories or files that are not a bundle jar.

title: ARIES-1047 Upgrade to JPA 2.1
body:
Add JPA 2.1 support using geronimo-jpa_2.1.

NB: for now, this pull request uses geronimo-jpa_2.1 1.0-SNAPSHOT waiting for the released version.

title: ARIES-1006 Full compilation support with JDK 7
body: Patch to fully support compilation with JDK 7

title: [ARIES-1186] Support Java 8 with ASM 5.0.2 in Aries Proxy
body:
Patch uses ASM 5.0.2 and handles java 8 default methods in proxies. 

Running integration tests on Java 8 requires a Pax Runner 1.8.6-SNAPSHOT. (Build locally or add OPS4J Snapshots repo).

To run tests under Java 8, first compile under Java 7, then use "mvn test" only under Java 8.

title: Fix managed service factory
body:
Multiple changes to fix the managed service factory in blueprint.

There are multiple issues reported about this. For example: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARIES-915.

title: [ARIES-1167] use ExtraOption, not CoreOption for mavenBundle()
body: ExtraOption.mavenBundle() adds `versionAsInProject()` to bundle. CoreOption.mavenBundle - doesn't.

title: [ARIES-1165] esa-maven-bundle without packaging type "esa"
body: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARIES-1165

title: Please merge fix for ARIES-1078
body: ARIES-1078 : Fix for provider registration listener, which stops waiting after one provider is found, instead of waiting for the target provider.

title: initial spike of ARIES-1038 so that blueprint-noosgi can be easily used ...
body: ...inside a servlet engine without an OSGi environment; but booting up all the META-INF/blueprint.xml files and performing the DI on everything using blueprint-noosgi

title: Fix class name in exception messages
body:
Hi,

I found a mistake in some of the exceptions raised by Blueprint.
The class name included in the message was not using Class.getName().

Here is a simple fix.

You are free to include this fix back to the trunk.

Thanks for your great work!
